original_text: When Samuel had all Israel come forward by tribes, the tribe of Benjamin was taken by lot.
korean_text: 사무엘이 이에 이스라엘 모든 지파를 가까이 오게 하였더니 베냐민 지파가 뽑혔고

sentences.original_text: When Samuel had all Israel come forward by tribes
sentences.korean_translation: 사무엘이 모든 이스라엘을 지파별로 앞으로 나오게 했을 때

sentences.original_text: the tribe of Benjamin was taken by lot
